meal.mealSavedDescription: Your meal has been saved successfully.
meal.startLogging: Start by adding your first meal!

goals.goalsUpdatedDescription: Your daily nutrition goals have been saved successfully.
goals.recommendedCalories: Recommended: 1800-2500 calories per day for most adults
goals.calorieGoalAchieved: Congratulations! You've reached your daily calorie goal of {{calories}} calories.
goals.proteinGoalAchieved: Amazing! You've reached your daily protein goal of {{protein}}g.

notifications.masterSwitch: Master switch for all notification types
notifications.goalAchievementsDescription: Celebrate when you reach your daily goals
notifications.weeklyProgressDescription: Weekly summary of your nutrition tracking
notifications.notificationsEnabledDescription: You'll now receive helpful reminders and achievement notifications.
notifications.notificationsBlockedDescription: You can enable notifications in your browser settings if you change your mind.
notifications.notSupportedDescription: Your browser doesn't support notifications. You'll still receive in-app notifications when using the app.
notifications.breakfastReminder: Start your day right with a nutritious breakfast. Don't forget to log it!
notifications.lunchReminder: Time for a healthy lunch to fuel your afternoon. Remember to track it!
notifications.dinnerReminder: End your day with a balanced dinner. Don't forget to log your meal!
notifications.hydrationReminder: Remember to drink water throughout the day for optimal health.

history.noMealsFound: No meals found matching your criteria

settings.calculatorDescription: This calculator provides estimates for Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE). Consult with a healthcare professional for personalized nutrition advice.
settings.calculatorFeatureDescription: This feature will help you calculate your daily calorie needs based on your profile.
settings.privacyDescription: Your nutrition data is stored securely in your personal Google Sheets. We don't store your data on our servers, giving you full control and ownership.
settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app interface.

errors.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields.
errors.enterValidNumbers: Please enter valid positive numbers for your goals.
errors.imageTooLarge: Please select an image smaller than 5MB.
errors.selectValidImage: Please select a valid image file.
errors.cameraNotSupported: Camera not supported on this device
errors.cameraAccessDenied: Camera access denied. Please allow camera permissions and try again.
errors.noCameraFound: No camera found on this device.
errors.cameraNotSupported: Camera not supported on this device.
errors.cameraAccessFailed: Failed to access camera. Please try again.
errors.unknownCameraError: An unknown error occurred while accessing the camera.
errors.offlineDescription: You're offline. Changes will sync when connection is restored.
errors.cachedDataDescription: Couldn't sync with Google Sheets. Showing last cached data.
errors.failedToAddMeal: Failed to add meal. Please try again.
errors.failedToUpdateGoals: Failed to update goals. Please try again.

validation.foodNameMinLength: Food name must be at least 2 characters
validation.foodNameMaxLength: Food name must be less than 100 characters
validation.amountMaxLength: Amount must be less than 50 characters
validation.caloriesWholeNumber: Calories must be a whole number
validation.proteinDecimal: Protein can have at most 1 decimal place
validation.imageFormat: Image must be JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF format
validation.calorieGoalMin: Daily calories should be at least 800 for health reasons
validation.proteinGoalMin: Daily protein should be at least 20g for health reasons
